abstract.para: Being an open source software development project, Uludag will attract valuable outsider contribution. Contributor Relations project is for guiding and directing these contributor.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Contributor Relations Project:
The roles for contributors, such as developer, tester, bug provider, feature requester, etc. will be identified and described, The external contributors will be monitored, guided, contacted and managed within the open source etiquette, The relations with the open source will be strengthened, important occasions (meetings, conferences, etc.) will be attended, The guidelines and criteria for all external contribution will be determined, manuals will be prepared.
Project contact: Zerrin Çakmakkaya, zerrin@uludag.org.tr
